text: I know it’s only Thursday, but I’ve had a case of the Fridays all week…
Not sure what the weather's like out there, but definitely feeling it here. Been sunny and around 70 nearly constantly.

yep that’s how it is here, I sit facing a window at my office. it’s kinda depressing. Might convince some people here to go work on the roof with me tomorrow, just need to figure out a better way to stay connected to the internet. I’m thinking 500 ft ethernet cord running down to the office dangling off the side of the roof
I'm moving this weekend and I had to work from my new home Tuesday. I was this.close to working from the hot tub, but opted for just a camping chair on the deck

Hey, better than no window and flickering LEDs, but at least I'm mobile, and we have a roof deck :laughing: Everyone laughs at me because I'm a developer and I'm like constantly sunburned from working up there haha
I feel ya man! I used to have to climb out of our window so I could sit on the only sunny and grassy spot our old office building had were we could still get wifi...
